title: Fieldnation
description: Field Nation is the leading online work platform for connecting businesses and workers. Global enterprises to small local companies use Field Nation’s self-service web portal to find, manage and pay workers for any specific job on demand — whether that be 1099 independent contractors or W2 employees. The platform gives workers the opportunity to promote their credentials and work history and find work. Field Nation currently has over 40,000 service providers in its network and serves businesses globally.
